1.name: Oohoroc
1.description: This black mage is an expert of attack magic. Strength of spells improves with use
1.skilldescription:
Activate: ○○□○
Combo: ○○□○
Countless shooting stars coalesce and form magic fireballs which rain down upon the entire earth.

2.name: Pingrek
2.description: This white mage serves as healer and support unit, and blunts attacks with an ice wall.
2.skilldescription:
Activate: ○○△△ 〜 △△□○
Combo: △△□○
Creates a giant ice castle that emits a visible energy which gradually heals allies (DH only).

3.name: Cannogabang
3.description: This devastating ranged cannon unit supports troops from the rear. Weak at close-range.
3.skilldescription:
Activate: ○○△△ 〜 ○○□○
Execute powerful cannon attack.
Cannon: glowing shells.
Blunderbuss: piercing fire spray.
Laser: ultra-ginormous laser.

4.name: Yumiyacha
4.description: The basic archer class. Launches attacks from the near. Favourable winds carry the arrows further.
4.skilldescription:
Activate: ○○□○
Combo: ○○□○
Fire a barrage of arrows into the sky which fall down a moment later and impale enemies, causing heavy damage.

5.name: Alosson
5.description: This long-range archer fires volleys of arrows. Learns to use longbows with experience.
5.skilldescription:
Activate: ○○□○
Combo: ○○□○
Rapidly fire glowing arrows! Power of glow enhances with high volume. Powerful weapon with fired rapidly.

6.name: Wondabarappa
6.description: This intrepid minstrel blankets foes with sonic balls which can also cause stagger.
6.skilldescription:
Activate: ○○□○
Combo: ○○□○
Fire three sonic balls per shot. The balls bounce about unpredictably and relentlessly inflict damage upon foes.

7.name: Jamsch
7.description: This dark minstrel has weak offence, but its sonic balls cause various status effects.
7.skilldescription:
Activate: ○○□○
Combo: ○○□○
Fire poisonous spores into the sky to inflict poison damage on all foes. Destination determined by wind.
